metadata.title: CVE-2013-2043 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
apps/calendar/ajax/events.php in ownCloud before 4.5.11 and 5.x before5.0.6 does not properly check the ownership of a calendar, which allowsremote authenticated users to download arbitrary calendars via thecalendar_id parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2043` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
